channel.title: English on Haoqiu's Website

item.title: Word Power Made Easy
item.description: Introduction This is a note for a book named Word Power Made Easy. The words I learned from this book were summarized into the mind maps shown below. If you still struggled with the English words, I strongly recommend this book to you. It will refresh your idea about words, help you understand the prefix, root and suffix. Mind Maps Personality Doctors Practitioners Science Liar Actions Speech Habits Enemies Friends Common Phenomena and Occurrences What's going on
